text:
[Verse]
Saw a light in the sky
Shining bright oh so high
Wishing dreams on the fly
Let the night take me by

[Verse 2]
In the night I believe
Stars fall down when we need
Close my eyes and I see
All the things we could be

[Chorus]
Shooting stars in the sky
Make a wish let it fly
Hold my hand you and I
Dreams can never die

[Verse 3]
Take a breath hear the sound
Magic all around
Hearts can never be bound
Feel my feet off the ground

[Chorus]
Shooting stars in the sky
Make a wish let it fly
Hold my hand you and I
Dreams can never die

[Bridge]
Every night find a star
Blaze a trail near and far
In our hearts we are free
Sparkling destiny
title: Shooting Stars
